CustomField.description: Id of the Account Record that 'represents' the CCS organisation. This has been created because CCS uses the URN values of accounts for integration purposes and needs to include itself as a record to integrate. Storing this will allow for the lookup of the internal account to get the URN (amongst other values)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Id of the Account Record that 'represents' the CCS organisation. Typically, this should be the Id of the 'Crown Commercial Service' account.
CustomField.label: Internal Account Id
